name: Seed Meilleur
description:
| ░ Seed Meilleur ░ |

Puzzle Platformer  made in 48h for the GGJ 2023.

Embark for perilous journey in a weird environment as the Seed Carrier.
Avoid hazards, sacrifice some of your precious Seeds to create a path back to the Nest
 where you were born and where you will perpetuate your species.
Beware not to stand still for too long or you'll literally grow roots and fall into slumber!

CONTROLS

Movement - Up / Right / Left / Down
Jump - Space
Plant a Seed to create a climbable platform - E

CREDITS

Adrien: design
Arnaud: art
Cedric : code
Niko: audio
NRG: level art
